publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-209 Eleanor Scott: Marine National Parksâ€”That the Parliament is inspired by the vision of the Wester Ross Marine Reserve Partnership, the Hebridean Marine National Park Partnership and the Fair Isle Marine Environment and Tourism Initiative; agrees with these groups that it is vital to achieve an integrated coastal zone management around Scotland with local communities playing a lead role, and recommends the commencement of formal consultations with these local communities on the establishment of marine national parks.
S2M-209 Marine National Parks (lodged on 27 June 2003) Robin Harper*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Carolyn Leckie*, Patrick Harvie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-209 Marine National Parks (lodged on 27 June 2003) Rosie Kane*
S2M-209 Marine National Parks (lodged on 27 June 2003) Chris Ballance*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-209 Marine National Parks (lodged on 27 June 2003) Mark Ballard*
